title: 100: Jeremy Bolm w/ Guest Host Jordan Dreyer - Part 1 of 2: I Am Aware That I Said the Wrong Pearl Jam Music Video, and I’ll Never Sleep Again
itunes:title: 100: Jeremy Bolm w/ Guest Host Jordan Dreyer - Part 1 of 2: I Am Aware That I Said the Wrong Pearl Jam Music Video, and I’ll Never Sleep Again
description:
This week guest host Jordan Dreyer of La Dispute interviews Jeremy Bolm in an extra special role reversal to celebrate 100 episodes. 

ALSO: Ben Walsh of Tigers Jaw does an extra special cover of the theme song!

On this part 1 of 2 episode; Jordan and Jeremy reflect on the past 99 episodes and talk 80’s pop music, grunge, first interests in singing, guitar lessons, album singles in the 90’s vs now, DB Cooper, being a latchkey kid, nu metal, the life of a goth/metal kid in high school after Columbine happened, finding hardcore, his first experience singing, the genesis of Touché Amoré, when Jordan and Jeremy met, when TA almost broke up, his relationship with Thursday and to the beat of a dead horse, touring “professionally”, recording Parting The Sea Between Brightness and Me, and more!

SUBSCRIBE TO THE PATREON to hear a bonus episode where Jeremy and Jordan both answered questions that were submitted by subscribers!

Follow the show on INSTAGRAM and TWITTER

Want some First Ever Podcast merch? Click here!
